content: f s riendship ocks by holly isaac --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- this pattern is written for 2 50g skeins of yarn with the intention being that you split and share a 100g skein with a friend however you can always use 2 50g skeins of your own or leftovers size adult x-small small med med/large large x-large to fit about 7 7 5 8 8 5 9 9 5 inch foot circumference materials ❖ 100g light fingering weight yarn in 2 colors 50g each color ❖ us size 1 2 25mm needle or size needed to obtain gauge ❖ stitch markers ❖ tapestry needle gauge 9 stitches and 12 row/inch in stockinette notes ❖ when more than one number is given the first applies to the x-small size the second to the small and so on ❖ the size of the sock can be adjusted by adjusting needle size and/or by using a lighter or heavier fingering weight yarn ❖ before starting your mini gusset and heel check yourrow gauge mini wedge gusset is 12 rounds and the heel adds 18 20 20 22 24 26 row to your length so for example with my gauge and 6 gusset stitches per side my gusset is about 1 and my heel is about another 1 5 - 2 abbreviations k knit p purl m1l make 1 left m1r make 1 right pm/sm place marker/slip marker ksw knit shadow wrap see note at end for instructions psw purl shadow wrap see note at end tksw/tpsw triple knit/purl shadow wrap see note at end k2tog knit 2 together ssk slip slip knit ©2022 holly isaac for personal use only hollyisaac on ravelry pattern support hollymocha3@gmail com 1 toe upinstructions toe with color a using judy s magic cast on caston 20 20 24 24 24 28 stitches 10 10 12 12 12 14 per needle knit the set up round round 1 k1 m1r knit to last stitch of instep m1l k1 repeat for sole stitches round 2 knit repeat these two rounds until you have 56 60 64 68 72 76 stitches knit 4 more rounds with color a for a total of 5 rounds of plain knit in color a then begin the fade sequence into color b as follows carry yarn up side during fade sequence attach color b and knit 1 round in color b knit 4 rounds in color a knit 2 rounds in color b knit 3 rounds in color a knit 3 rounds in color b knit 2 rounds in color a knit 4 rounds in color b knit 1 round in color a cut color a leaving a tail long enough to weave in later knit 5 rounds in color b foot continue knitting the foot in color b until3 5 from desired foot length see note above now you will work the fade in reverse back to color a for the heel as follows attach color a and knit 1 round in color a knit 4 rounds
